entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023
